verse.roman:
hariḥ purastāj jagṛhe
pūrvaṁ devās tato 'bhavan

synonyms: hariḥ—the Supreme Personality of Godhead, Ajita; purastāt—from the front; jagṛhe—took; pūrvam—at first; devāḥ—the demigods; tataḥ—thereafter; abhavan—took the front portion of Vāsuki.
translation: The Personality of Godhead, Ajita, grasped the front portion of the snake, and then the demigods followed.
